name: Elemental Susceptibility
description: Send the elements to sap an enemy's defenses and afflict them with Major Breach for 1 minute, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948.  Every 6 seconds while this ability persists, the enemy is afflicted with the Burning, Chilled, or Concussion status effect.
effectLines: Randomly applies a status effect periodically while active, increases the range, and extends the duration.
rawDescription:
Send the elements to sap an enemy's defenses and afflict them with <<1>> for <<2>>, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by <<3>>.

Every <<4>> while this ability persists, the enemy is afflicted with the Burning, Chilled, or Concussion status effect.
